item.title: Block World
item.description: According to the plot of the Minecraft 100 game, you become a famous traveler, abandoned on a desert island by the will of fate. On the way to the saving village, you have to go around many traps and defeat terrible monsters. Carefully observe the environment, if you’re lucky, along the way you can find a lot of items that will be useful in further adventures. Don’t forget to smash some of the rocks you see, as they can hide 100 unexpectedly useful items, from tools to jewelry.
